ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating an AccessNS/Inventory Management Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'AccessNS/Inventory Management') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed'), NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR( ISBLANK(NS_CorrectiveAction__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Corrective Action prior to closing the Case.
